effect.x_y: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages. Halves the user’s weight; this effect does not stack.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.

flavor_text.x_y: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.
